img.window_not_logged_in: Mylifecar.com's page without a user to log in

text.first:
Any mylifecar.com page consists of three main elements: head, body and foot.
Only body is scrollable.
Hyperlinks in the site can be of three styles (and/or combination of them):
  • Default link style is red (optional), bold and underlined text like this
  • Second link style is blue, bold text (with yellow background while mouse cursor is over) like this
  • And last link style is red (optional), bold and dashed underlined text (which means that this link won't open another page but execute some Javascript) like this
text.window_not_logged_in: Take a closer look at mylifecar.com page's structure (when nobody is logged in):
text.basic_model_page: It's how looks like basic model-page (after user logged in):
text.the_end: That's all so far, we hope you'll enjoy our website!..
